alert.body: Use the following link to check the status of your request at any time. It is crucial that you save it in a safe place, as we will not be able to recover it for you.
alert.title: Important! Save this link.

verify.footer: If you have any questions or need further assistance, do not hesitate to contact our support team.
verify.intro: We have received your request and are processing it. Below you will find important information on how you can track its status.

link.description: You can track the status of your request by accessing the following link:

verify.title: Thank you for submitting your information!
